masterhead.subtitle: It's a pleasure to share my journey and projects with you.

dashboard.title: Personal Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Statistics and metrics from my learning journey

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Learn about my 23+ years professional journey

instructor.title: Starting as an Instructor
instructor.description: I began my professional journey as an instructor at Alpha Tech, teaching Delphi programming, hardware, website design, and basic computing. For five years, I developed teaching skills and deepened my technical knowledge, including private lessons and corporate training.

transition.title: Transition to Development
transition.description: I transitioned from teaching to software development, working at Softpar. I applied my technical experience to enterprise system projects, consolidating knowledge in Delphi and databases. A fundamental period for understanding complex business rules and critical system development.

financial.title: 11 Years in Financial Systems
financial.description: The longest and most transformative period at View Financial Systems. I developed critical financial systems focused on checking accounts, documents, and leasing operations. During these 11 years, I led the migration of Delphi systems to .NET, using technologies like C#, Visual Studio, Oracle, and SQL Server. Essential experience that shaped my expertise in high-availability systems.

modernization.title: Modernization and New Technologies
modernization.description: A period of great technical evolution at Zylix, working with industrial automation systems and adopting modern technologies. I implemented solutions with .NET Core, microservices, Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms like Azure. A crucial phase for my definitive transition to software architecture.

architect.title: Software Architect at Consilux
architect.description: Currently working as Software Architect and consultant at Consilux, focusing on code review, cloud application management, and system architecture for the financial sector. I develop solutions for fintechs and payment gateways, using technologies like Azure, AWS, .NET, RabbitMQ, Kubernetes, and observability tools like DataDog and Grafana. Specialized in legacy system modernization and DevOps practices implementation.

graduation.title: (Post)Graduation
graduation.subtitle: Learn more about my graduations and postgraduations.

formationCourse.title: Formation Courses
formationCourse.subtitle: Learn more about my formation courses

aboutThisPage.title: About this page
aboutThisPage.description: This page was created to showcase my career and knowledge, as well as to practice Angular and TypeScript. The project uses Angular (currently version 20), is versioned on GitHub, and deployment is automatically performed via GitHub Actions, being hosted on Azure Static Web Apps.
